tool_description: Evaluates and ranks suppliers based on delivery performance, quality metrics, pricing, and reliability factors to support procurement decisions.

supplier_ids.description: List of supplier IDs to evaluate

evaluation_period_months.description: Period for performance evaluation in months (3-24)

weight_delivery.description: Weight for delivery performance in evaluation (0.1-0.5)

weight_quality.description: Weight for quality metrics in evaluation (0.1-0.5)

weight_pricing.description: Weight for pricing competitiveness in evaluation (0.1-0.4)

weight_reliability.description: Weight for overall reliability in evaluation (0.1-0.3)

error_messages: Invalid evaluation period: evaluation_period_months must be between 3 and 24.
Weight sum error: All weights must sum to 1.0 (Â±0.01 tolerance).
Invalid weight values: All weight parameters must be within their specified ranges.
Insufficient supplier data: Suppliers must have at least 3 transactions in evaluation period.
usage: Input supplier IDs and adjust weight parameters to customize evaluation criteria. Higher weights emphasize specific performance aspects in the final ranking.

supplier_rankings.description: Suppliers ranked from best to worst performance

overall_scores.description: Overall performance scores (0-100) for each supplier

performance_categories.description: Performance category ratings for each supplier

recommendation.description: Procurement recommendation based on evaluation results
